pageInstructions.departure_flight_selection: Select a flight that leaves Madrid after 09:00 and does not have extra legroom.
pageInstructions.return_flight_selection: Select a flight that arrives in Barcelona before 10:00 and offers priority boarding.
pageInstructions.departure_baggage_options: Choose a baggage option without checked baggage.
pageInstructions.return_baggage_options: Choose a baggage option that allows your to check a 30kg bag.
